name: runnel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small stream: The broken path that led up the mountainside had become a runnel. The water is crystal clear, the pools and runnels alive with the shadows of fish.
an amount of liquid that is flowing: A runnel of sweat began to trickle down his forehead. His tanned skin glistened with runnels of water.
UK a channel (= passage) that water flows along : He was bending over the stone runnel where it came into the garden from outside. They attack in the alleys and runnels of the city, not in the open countryside.
